message.body: hi, how does it work when you download a file from the zeronet server, does it first get downloaded and storen on your computer and then made available for download or does it get downloaded directly when you click on a link?
i was refering to this site
it seems like it hosts files on zeronet
so when i click on one (just for testing the download function)
do i download them firs tlike encrypted and then clear to the browser
or does it just download straight from the network to the browser
or does it just download straight from the network to the browser
and if i click on the link and then cancel
did it download the file or not?
im afraid those files contain viruses
but clicked on one of the links nevertheless
